texts.biography: Lilyam, despite being born in the forests of Avlee, is an expert at digging up resources from the underworld. When her fascination with a sulfur did not obtain approval from the druids, she went to the King of Deyja, who gladly accepted her as a commander.
texts.name: Lilyam

specialty.name: +1 Sulfur
specialty.description:
{Sulfur}

Increases kingdom's sulfur production by 1 per day.
